                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             14: * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and                                                                          
                             15: * limitations under the License.                                                                                                               
                             16: */                                                                                                                                             
                             17:package org.apache.pdfbox.pdfparser;                                                                                                            
                             18:                                                                                                                                                
                             19:import java.io.IOException;                                                                                                                     
                             20:import java.util.ArrayList;                                                                                                                     
                             21:import java.util.HashMap;                                                                                                                       
                             22:import java.util.List;                                                                                                                          
                             23:import java.util.Map;                                                                                                                           
                             24:import java.util.Map.Entry;                                                                                                                     
                             25:import java.util.stream.Collectors;                                                                                                             
                             26:                                                                                                                                                
                             27:import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;                                                                                                         
                             28:import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;                                                                                                     
                             29:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSArray;                                                                                                          
                             30:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSBase;                                                                                                           
                             31:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSDictionary;                                                                                                     
                             32:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSDocument;                                                                                                       
                             33:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSName;                                                                                                           
                             34:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSObject;                                                                                                         
                             35:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSObjectKey;                                                                                                      
                             36:import org.apache.pdfbox.cos.COSStream;                                                                                                         
                             37:import org.apache.pdfbox.io.RandomAccessRead;                                                                                                   
                             38:import org.apache.pdfbox.pdfparser.XrefTrailerResolver.XRefType;                                                                                
                             39:import org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.encryption.ProtectionPolicy;                                                                                   
                             40:import org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.encryption.SecurityHandler;                                                                                    
                             41:                                                                                                                                                
                             42:/**                                                                                                                                             
                             43: * Brute force parser to be used as last resort if a malformed pdf can't be read.                                                               
                             44: */                                                                                                                                             
                             45:public class BruteForceParser                                                                                                                   
                             46:{                                                                                                                                               
                             47:    private static final char[] XREF_TABLE = { 'x', 'r', 'e', 'f' };                                                                            
                             48:    private static final char[] XREF_STREAM = { '/', 'X', 'R', 'e', 'f' };                                                                      
                             49:                                                                                                                                                
                             50:    private static final long MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET = 6;                                                                                        
                             51:                                                                                                                                                
                             52:    /**                                                                                                                                         
                             53:     * EOF-marker.                                                                                                                              
                             54:     */                                                                                                                                         
                             55:    private static final char[] EOF_MARKER = { '%', '%', 'E', 'O', 'F' };                                                                       
                             56:    /**                                                                                                                                         
                             57:     * obj-marker.                                                                                                                              
                             58:     */                                                                                                                                         
                             59:    private static final char[] OBJ_MARKER = { 'o', 'b', 'j' };                                                                                 
                             60:                                                                                                                                                
                             61:    /**                                                                                                                                         
                             62:     * trailer-marker.                                                                                                                          
                             63:     */                                                                                                                                         
                             64:    private static final char[] TRAILER_MARKER = { 't', 'r', 'a', 'i', 'l', 'e', 'r' };                                                         
                             65:                                                                                                                                                
                             66:    /**                                                                                                                                         
                             67:     * ObjStream-marker.                                                                                                                        
                             68:     */                                                                                                                                         
                             69:    private static final char[] OBJ_STREAM = { '/', 'O', 'b', 'j', 'S', 't', 'm' };                                                             
                             70:                                                                                                                                                
                             71:    private static final Logger LOG = LogManager.getLogger(BruteForceParser.class);                                                             
                             72:                                                                                                                                                
                             73:    /**                                                                                                                                         
                             74:     * Contains all found objects of a brute force search.                                                                                      
                             75:     */                                                                                                                                         
                             76:    private final Map<COSObjectKey, Long> bfSearchCOSObjectKeyOffsets = new HashMap<>();                                                        
                             77:                                                                                                                                                
                             78:    private boolean bfSearchTriggered = false;                                                                                                  
                             79:                                                                                                                                                
                             80:    private final COSParser parser;                                                                                                             
                             81:    private final COSDocument document;                                                                                                         
                             82:    private final RandomAccessRead source;                                                                                                      
                             83:                                                                                                                                                
                             84:    /**                                                                                                                                         
                             85:     * Constructor. Triggers a brute force search for all objects of the document.                                                              
                             86:     *                                                                                                                                          
                             87:     * @param cosDocument the corresponding COS document                                                                                        
                             88:     * @param cosParser the COSParser to be used for reading the pdf                                                                            
                             89:     *                                                                                                                                          
                             90:     * @throws IOException if the source data could not be read                                                                                 
                             91:     */                                                                                                                                         
                             92:    public BruteForceParser(COSDocument cosDocument, COSParser cosParser) throws IOException                                                    
                             93:    {                                                                                                                                           
                             94:        document = cosDocument;                                                                                                                 
                             95:        parser = cosParser;                                                                                                                     
                             96:        source = parser.source;                                                                                                                 
                             97:    }                                                                                                                                           
                             98:                                                                                                                                                
                             99:    /**                                                                                                                                         
                             100:     * Indicates wether the brute force search for objects was triggered.                                                                      
                             101:     *                                                                                                                                         
                             102:     * @return true if the search was triggered                                                                                                
                             103:     */                                                                                                                                        
                             104:    public boolean bfSearchTriggered()                                                                                                         
                             105:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             106:        return bfSearchTriggered;                                                                                                              
                             107:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             108:                                                                                                                                               
                             109:    /**                                                                                                                                        
                             110:     * Returns all found objects of a brute force search.                                                                                      
                             111:     *                                                                                                                                         
                             112:     * @return map containing all found objects of a brute force search                                                                        
                             113:     *                                                                                                                                         
                             114:     * @throws IOException if something went wrong                                                                                             
                             115:     *                                                                                                                                         
                             116:     */                                                                                                                                        
                             117:    protected Map<COSObjectKey, Long> getBFCOSObjectOffsets() throws IOException                                                               
                             118:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             119:        if (!bfSearchTriggered)                                                                                                                
                             120:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             121:            bfSearchTriggered = true;                                                                                                          
                             122:            bfSearchForObjects();                                                                                                              
                             123:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             124:        return bfSearchCOSObjectKeyOffsets;                                                                                                    
                             125:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             126:                                                                                                                                               
                             127:    /**                                                                                                                                        
                             128:     * Brute force search for every object in the pdf.                                                                                         
                             129:     *                                                                                                                                         
                             130:     * @throws IOException if something went wrong                                                                                             
                             131:     */                                                                                                                                        
                             132:    private void bfSearchForObjects() throws IOException                                                                                       
                             133:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             134:        long lastEOFMarker = bfSearchForLastEOFMarker();                                                                                       
                             135:        long originOffset = source.getPosition();                                                                                              
                             136:        long currentOffset = MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET;                                                                                            
                             137:        long lastObjectId = Long.MIN_VALUE;                                                                                                    
                             138:        int lastGenID = Integer.MIN_VALUE;                                                                                                     
                             139:        long lastObjOffset = Long.MIN_VALUE;                                                                                                   
                             140:        char[] endobjString = "ndo".toCharArray();                                                                                             
                             141:        char[] endobjRemainingString = "bj".toCharArray();                                                                                     
                             142:        boolean endOfObjFound = false;                                                                                                         
                             143:        do                                                                                                                                     
                             144:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             145:            source.seek(currentOffset);                                                                                                        
                             146:            int nextChar = source.read();                                                                                                      
                             147:            currentOffset++;                                                                                                                   
                             148:            if (BaseParser.isWhitespace(nextChar) && parser.isString(OBJ_MARKER))                                                              
                             149:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             150:                long tempOffset = currentOffset - 2;                                                                                           
                             151:                source.seek(tempOffset);                                                                                                       
                             152:                int genID = source.peek();                                                                                                     
                             153:                // is the next char a digit?                                                                                                   
                             154:                if (BaseParser.isDigit(genID))                                                                                                 
                             155:                {                                                                                                                              
                             156:                    genID -= 48;                                                                                                               
                             157:                    tempOffset--;                                                                                                              
                             158:                    source.seek(tempOffset);                                                                                                   
                             159:                    if (parser.isWhitespace())                                                                                                 
                             160:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             161:                        while (tempOffset > MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET && parser.isWhitespace())                                                    
                             162:                        {                                                                                                                      
                             163:                            source.seek(--tempOffset);                                                                                         
                             164:                        }                                                                                                                      
                             165:                        boolean objectIDFound = false;                                                                                         
                             166:                        while (tempOffset > MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET && parser.isDigit())                                                         
                             167:                        {                                                                                                                      
                             168:                            source.seek(--tempOffset);                                                                                         
                             169:                            objectIDFound = true;                                                                                              
                             170:                        }                                                                                                                      
                             171:                        if (objectIDFound)                                                                                                     
                             172:                        {                                                                                                                      
                             173:                            source.read();                                                                                                     
                             174:                            long objectId = parser.readObjectNumber();                                                                         
                             175:                            if (lastObjOffset > 0)                                                                                             
                             176:                            {                                                                                                                  
                             177:                                // add the former object ID only if there was a subsequent object ID                                           
                             178:                                bfSearchCOSObjectKeyOffsets.put(                                                                               
                             179:                                        new COSObjectKey(lastObjectId, lastGenID), lastObjOffset);                                             
                             180:                            }                                                                                                                  
                             181:                            lastObjectId = objectId;                                                                                           
                             182:                            lastGenID = genID;                                                                                                 
                             183:                            lastObjOffset = tempOffset + 1;                                                                                    
                             184:                            currentOffset += OBJ_MARKER.length - 1;                                                                            
                             185:                            endOfObjFound = false;                                                                                             
                             186:                        }                                                                                                                      
                             187:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             188:                }                                                                                                                              
                             189:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             190:            // check for "endo" as abbreviation for "endobj", as the pdf may be cut off                                                        
                             191:            // in the middle of the keyword, see PDFBOX-3936.                                                                                  
                             192:            // We could possibly implement a more intelligent algorithm if necessary                                                           
                             193:            else if (nextChar == 'e' && parser.isString(endobjString))                                                                         
                             194:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             195:                currentOffset += endobjString.length;                                                                                          
                             196:                source.seek(currentOffset);                                                                                                    
                             197:                if (parser.isEOF())                                                                                                            
                             198:                {                                                                                                                              
                             199:                    endOfObjFound = true;                                                                                                      
                             200:                }                                                                                                                              
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/BaseParser.java:281-329                                                                           
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             281:    protected COSDictionary parseCOSDictionary(boolean isDirect) throws IOException                                                            
                             282:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             283:        readExpectedChar('<');                                                                                                                 
                             284:        readExpectedChar('<');                                                                                                                 
                             285:        skipSpaces();                                                                                                                          
                             286:        COSDictionary obj = new COSDictionary();                                                                                               
                             287:        obj.setDirect(isDirect);                                                                                                               
                             288:        while (true)                                                                                                                           
                             289:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             290:            skipSpaces();                                                                                                                      
                             291:            char c = (char) source.peek();                                                                                                     
                             292:            if (c == '>')                                                                                                                      
                             293:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             294:                break;                                                                                                                         
                             295:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             296:            else if (c == '/')                                                                                                                 
                             297:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             298:                // something went wrong, most likely the dictionary is corrupted                                                               
                             299:                // stop immediately and return everything read so far                                                                          
                             300:                if (!parseCOSDictionaryNameValuePair(obj))                                                                                     
                             301:                {                                                                                                                              
                             302:                    return obj;                                                                                                                
                             303:                }                                                                                                                              
                             304:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             305:            else                                                                                                                               
                             306:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             307:                // invalid dictionary, we were expecting a /Name, read until the end or until we can recover                                   
                             308:                LOG.warn("Invalid dictionary, found: '{}' but expected: '/' at offset {}", c,                                                  
                             309:                        source.getPosition());                                                                                                 
                             310:                if (readUntilEndOfCOSDictionary())                                                                                             
                             311:                {                                                                                                                              
                             312:                    // we couldn't recover                                                                                                     
                             313:                    return obj;                                                                                                                
                             314:                }                                                                                                                              
                             315:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             316:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             317:        try                                                                                                                                    
                             318:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             319:            readExpectedChar('>');                                                                                                             
                             320:            readExpectedChar('>');                                                                                                             
                             321:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             322:        catch (IOException exception)                                                                                                          
                             323:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             324:            LOG.warn("Invalid dictionary, can't find end of dictionary at offset {}",                                                          
                             325:                    source.getPosition());                                                                                                     
                             326:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             327:        return obj;                                                                                                                            
                             328:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             329:                                                                                                                                               
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/BaseParser.java:947-1001                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             947:     */                                                                                                                                        
                             948:    protected COSBase parseDirObject() throws IOException                                                                                      
                             949:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             950:        skipSpaces();                                                                                                                          
                             951:        char c = (char) source.peek();                                                                                                         
                             952:        switch(c)                                                                                                                              
                             953:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             954:        case '<':                                                                                                                              
                             955:            // pull off first left bracket                                                                                                     
                             956:            source.read();                                                                                                                     
                             957:            // check for second left bracket                                                                                                   
                             958:            c = (char) source.peek();                                                                                                          
                             959:            source.rewind(1);                                                                                                                  
                             960:            return c == '<' ? parseCOSDictionary(true) : parseCOSString();                                                                     
                             961:        case '[':                                                                                                                              
                             962:            // array                                                                                                                           
                             963:            return parseCOSArray();                                                                                                            
                             964:        case '(':                                                                                                                              
                             965:            return parseCOSString();                                                                                                           
                             966:        case '/':                                                                                                                              
                             967:            // name                                                                                                                            
                             968:            return parseCOSName();                                                                                                             
                             969:        case 'n':                                                                                                                              
                             970:            // null                                                                                                                            
                             971:            readExpectedString(NULL, false);                                                                                                   
                             972:            return COSNull.NULL;                                                                                                               
                             973:        case 't':                                                                                                                              
                             974:            readExpectedString(TRUE, false);                                                                                                   
                             975:            return COSBoolean.TRUE;                                                                                                            
                             976:        case 'f':                                                                                                                              
                             977:            readExpectedString(FALSE, false);                                                                                                  
                             978:            return COSBoolean.FALSE;                                                                                                           
                             979:        case 'R':                                                                                                                              
                             980:            source.read();                                                                                                                     
                             981:            return new COSObject(null);                                                                                                        
                             982:        case (char)-1:                                                                                                                         
                             983:            return null;                                                                                                                       
                             984:        default:                                                                                                                               
                             985:            if (isDigit(c) || c == '-' || c == '+' || c == '.')                                                                                
                             986:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             987:                return parseCOSNumber();                                                                                                       
                             988:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             989:            // This is not suppose to happen, but we will allow for it                                                                         
                             990:            // so we are more compatible with POS writers that don't                                                                           
                             991:            // follow the spec                                                                                                                 
                             992:            long startOffset = source.getPosition();                                                                                           
                             993:            String badString = readString();                                                                                                   
                             994:            if (badString.isEmpty())                                                                                                           
                             995:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             996:                int peek = source.peek();                                                                                                      
                             997:                // we can end up in an infinite loop otherwise                                                                                 
                             998:                throw new IOException("Unknown dir object c='" + c + "' cInt=" + (int) c + " peek='"                                           
                             999:                        + (char) peek + "' peekInt=" + peek + " at offset " + source.getPosition()                                             
                             1000:                        + " (start offset: " + startOffset + ")");                                                                            
                             1001:            }                                                                                                                                 
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:793-836                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             793:    private long readUntilEndStream(final EndstreamFilterStream out) throws IOException                                                        
                             794:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             795:        int bufSize;                                                                                                                           
                             796:        int charMatchCount = 0;                                                                                                                
                             797:        byte[] keyw = ENDSTREAM;                                                                                                               
                             798:                                                                                                                                               
                             799:        // last character position of shortest keyword ('endobj')                                                                              
                             800:        final int quickTestOffset = 5;                                                                                                         
                             801:                                                                                                                                               
                             802:        // read next chunk into buffer; already matched chars are added to beginning of buffer                                                 
                             803:        while ( ( bufSize = source.read( strmBuf, charMatchCount, STRMBUFLEN - charMatchCount ) ) > 0 )                                        
                             804:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             805:            bufSize += charMatchCount;                                                                                                         
                             806:                                                                                                                                               
                             807:            int bIdx = charMatchCount;                                                                                                         
                             808:            int quickTestIdx;                                                                                                                  
                             809:                                                                                                                                               
                             810:            // iterate over buffer, trying to find keyword match                                                                               
                             811:            for ( int maxQuicktestIdx = bufSize - quickTestOffset; bIdx < bufSize; bIdx++ )                                                    
                             812:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             813:                // reduce compare operations by first test last character we would have to                                                     
                             814:                // match if current one matches; if it is not a character from keywords                                                        
                             815:                // we can move behind the test character; this shortcut is inspired by the                                                     
                             816:                // Boyer-Moore string search algorithm and can reduce parsing time by approx. 20%                                              
                             817:                quickTestIdx = bIdx + quickTestOffset;                                                                                         
                             818:                if (charMatchCount == 0 && quickTestIdx < maxQuicktestIdx)                                                                     
                             819:                {                                                                                                                              
                             820:                    final byte ch = strmBuf[quickTestIdx];                                                                                     
                             821:                    if ( ( ch > 't' ) || ( ch < 'a' ) )                                                                                        
                             822:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             823:                        // last character we would have to match if current character would match                                              
                             824:                        // is not a character from keywords -> jump behind and start over                                                      
                             825:                        bIdx = quickTestIdx;                                                                                                   
                             826:                        continue;                                                                                                              
                             827:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             828:                }                                                                                                                              
                             829:                                                                                                                                               
                             830:                // could be negative - but we only compare to ASCII                                                                            
                             831:                final byte ch = strmBuf[bIdx];                                                                                                 
                             832:                                                                                                                                               
                             833:                if ( ch == keyw[ charMatchCount ] )                                                                                            
                             834:                {                                                                                                                              
                             835:                    if ( ++charMatchCount == keyw.length )                                                                                     
                             836:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             </code_snippets>                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Fix Strategy                                                                                                                                    
                             <fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             1. Overview and Root Cause                                                                                                                         
                                The libFuzzer timeout indicates that malformed or adversarial inputs trigger unbounded loops in PDFBoxs parsing                                
                             routinesparticularly in parseCOSDictionary (BaseParser) and in the readUntilEndStream method (COSParser). Without size limits,                    
                             these routines can scan indefinitely (or for very large swaths of data), causing the fuzzer to hit its timeout threshold.                          
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             2. Key Fix Components                                                                                                                              
                                a. Introduce upperbounds on iterative parsing loops based on the amount of data examined, not just syntactic markers.                          
                                b. Ensure these bounds are high enough to accommodate realworld PDF streams/dictionaries but low enough to defeat worstcase                   
                             fuzzer hangs.                                                                                                                                      
                                c. Throw an IOException if a bound is exceeded so that parsing can abort fast, surface an error, and allow fuzzer to continue                   
                             with other inputs.                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             3. Detailed Patch Steps                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                A. BaseParser.parseCOSDictionary                                                                                                                
                                - Add a new constant, MAX_DICTIONARY_SIZE (e.g., 1 MB).                                                                                         
                                - Before entering the while(true) loop, record long dictStart = source.getPosition().                                                         
                                - At the top of each iteration (or after skipSpaces), check                                                                                     
                                    if (source.getPosition() - dictStart > MAX_DICTIONARY_SIZE)                                                                                 
                                        LOG.error("Dictionary too large at offset {}", dictStart);                                                                              
                                        throw new IOException("Exceeded maximum PDF dictionary size");                                                                          
                                - This prevents endless looping when >> never appears.                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                B. COSParser.readUntilEndStream                                                                                                                 
                                - Define MAX_STREAM_SEARCH_SIZE (e.g., 10 MB).                                                                                                  
                                - Before the read loop, record long searchStart = source.getPosition().                                                                         
                                - In the while ((bufSize = source.read(...)) > 0) loop, after accumulating bufSize, check                                                       
                                    if ((source.getPosition() - searchStart) > MAX_STREAM_SEARCH_SIZE) {                                                                        
                                        LOG.error("No endstream found within {} bytes at offset {}",                                                                            
                                                  MAX_STREAM_SEARCH_SIZE, searchStart);                                                                                         
                                        throw new IOException("endstream marker not found within limit");                                                                       
                                    }                                                                                                                                           
                                - This bounds the BoyerMoorelike search and prevents scanning massive data.                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             4. Preserving Existing Functionality                                                                                                               
                                - Normal PDFs rarely contain dictionaries >1 MB or streams >10 MB without proper >> or endstream markers.                                   
                                - Thresholds can be tuned (via system properties or constants) if real-world use cases require larger values.                                   
                                - Throwing IOException on bound violation integrates with the existing parser errorhandling, bubbling up to skip or abort                      
                             parsing that section.                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             5. Side Effects and Mitigation                                                                                                                     
                                - Risk: Legitimate large dictionaries or streams in benign PDFs may be flagged too aggressively.                                                
                                  Mitigation:                                                                                                                                   
                                     Select conservative upper bounds initially.                                                                                               
                                     Expose those bounds as configurable parameters (e.g., system properties) so integrators can adjust for specific                           
                             workloads.                                                                                                                                         
                                     Log an ERROR-level message when the limit is hit to help users diagnose and, if necessary, raise the limit.                               
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             6. Rationale                                                                                                                                       
                                - Directly addresses the unbounded loops highlighted in the evaluation (parseCOSDictionarys infinite while(true) and                         
                             readUntilEndStreams unlimited scan).                                                                                                              
                                - Maintains controlflow invariants and existing exception paths (IOException) so that upstream logic (e.g., XrefParser) can                    
                             catch or skip over malformed sections.                                                                                                             
                                - Avoids touching harness, fuzzing logic, or external dependencies.                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             7. References to Similar Patterns                                                                                                                  
                                - Parsing of very large PDF arrays could be similarly bounded if need arises.                                                                   
                                - This pattern (track start offset, enforce a max delta) can be applied elsewhere (e.g., in bruteforce scanning), but initial                  
                             focus is on the two hottest loops causing timeout.                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             </fix_strategy>                                                                                                                                    
                             ===Evaluation End===
