                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/XrefParser.java:384-430                                                                           
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             384:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             385:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             386:        return false;                                                                                                                          
                             387:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             388:                                                                                                                                               
                             389:    private boolean validateXrefOffsets(Map<COSObjectKey, Long> xrefOffset) throws IOException                                                 
                             390:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             391:        if (xrefOffset == null)                                                                                                                
                             392:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             393:            return true;                                                                                                                       
                             394:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             395:        Map<COSObjectKey, COSObjectKey> correctedKeys = new HashMap<>();                                                                       
                             396:        HashSet<COSObjectKey> validKeys = new HashSet<>();                                                                                     
                             397:        for (Entry<COSObjectKey, Long> objectEntry : xrefOffset.entrySet())                                                                    
                             398:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             399:            COSObjectKey objectKey = objectEntry.getKey();                                                                                     
                             400:            Long objectOffset = objectEntry.getValue();                                                                                        
                             401:            // a negative offset number represents an object number itself                                                                     
                             402:            // see type 2 entry in xref stream                                                                                                 
                             403:            if (objectOffset != null && objectOffset >= 0)                                                                                     
                             404:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             405:                COSObjectKey foundObjectKey = findObjectKey(objectKey, objectOffset, xrefOffset);                                              
                             406:                if (foundObjectKey == null)                                                                                                    
                             407:                {                                                                                                                              
                             408:                    LOG.debug(                                                                                                                 
                             409:                            "Stop checking xref offsets as at least one ({}) couldn't be dereferenced",                                        
                             410:                            objectKey);                                                                                                        
                             411:                    return false;                                                                                                              
                             412:                }                                                                                                                              
                             413:                else if (foundObjectKey != objectKey)                                                                                          
                             414:                {                                                                                                                              
                             415:                    // Generation was fixed - need to update map later, after iteration                                                        
                             416:                    correctedKeys.put(objectKey, foundObjectKey);                                                                              
                             417:                }                                                                                                                              
                             418:                else                                                                                                                           
                             419:                {                                                                                                                              
                             420:                    validKeys.add(objectKey);                                                                                                  
                             421:                }                                                                                                                              
                             422:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             423:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             424:        Map<COSObjectKey, Long> correctedPointers = new HashMap<>();                                                                           
                             425:        for (Entry<COSObjectKey, COSObjectKey> correctedKeyEntry : correctedKeys.entrySet())                                                   
                             426:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             427:            if (!validKeys.contains(correctedKeyEntry.getValue()))                                                                             
                             428:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             429:                // Only replace entries, if the original entry does not point to a valid object                                                
                             430:                correctedPointers.put(correctedKeyEntry.getValue(),                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:241-295                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             241:    protected COSDictionary retrieveTrailer() throws IOException                                                                               
                             242:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             243:        COSDictionary trailer = null;                                                                                                          
                             244:        boolean rebuildTrailer = false;                                                                                                        
                             245:        try                                                                                                                                    
                             246:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             247:            // parse startxref                                                                                                                 
                             248:            // TODO FDF files don't have a startxref value, so that rebuildTrailer is triggered                                                
                             249:            long startXRefOffset = getStartxrefOffset();                                                                                       
                             250:            if (startXRefOffset > -1)                                                                                                          
                             251:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             252:                XrefParser xrefParser = new XrefParser(this);                                                                                  
                             253:                trailer = xrefParser.parseXref(document, startXRefOffset);                                                                     
                             254:                xrefTable.putAll(xrefParser.getXrefTable());                                                                                   
                             255:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             256:            else                                                                                                                               
                             257:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             258:                rebuildTrailer = isLenient();                                                                                                  
                             259:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             260:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             261:        catch (IOException exception)                                                                                                          
                             262:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             263:            if (isLenient())                                                                                                                   
                             264:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             265:                rebuildTrailer = true;                                                                                                         
                             266:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             267:            else                                                                                                                               
                             268:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             269:                throw exception;                                                                                                               
                             270:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             271:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             272:        // check if the trailer contains a Root object                                                                                         
                             273:        if (trailer != null && trailer.getItem(COSName.ROOT) == null)                                                                          
                             274:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             275:            rebuildTrailer = isLenient();                                                                                                      
                             276:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             277:        if (rebuildTrailer)                                                                                                                    
                             278:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             279:            // reset cross reference table                                                                                                     
                             280:            xrefTable.clear();                                                                                                                 
                             281:            trailer = getBruteForceParser().rebuildTrailer(xrefTable);                                                                         
                             282:            trailerWasRebuild = true;                                                                                                          
                             283:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             284:        else                                                                                                                                   
                             285:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             286:            // prepare decryption if necessary                                                                                                 
                             287:            prepareDecryption();                                                                                                               
                             288:            // don't use the getter as it creates an instance of BruteForceParser                                                              
                             289:            if (bruteForceParser != null && bruteForceParser.bfSearchTriggered())                                                              
                             290:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             291:                getBruteForceParser().bfSearchForObjStreams(xrefTable);                                                                        
                             292:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             293:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             294:        return trailer;                                                                                                                        
                             295:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/XrefParser.java:384-430                                                                           
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             384:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             385:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             386:        return false;                                                                                                                          
                             387:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             388:                                                                                                                                               
                             389:    private boolean validateXrefOffsets(Map<COSObjectKey, Long> xrefOffset) throws IOException                                                 
                             390:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             391:        if (xrefOffset == null)                                                                                                                
                             392:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             393:            return true;                                                                                                                       
                             394:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             395:        Map<COSObjectKey, COSObjectKey> correctedKeys = new HashMap<>();                                                                       
                             396:        HashSet<COSObjectKey> validKeys = new HashSet<>();                                                                                     
                             397:        for (Entry<COSObjectKey, Long> objectEntry : xrefOffset.entrySet())                                                                    
                             398:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             399:            COSObjectKey objectKey = objectEntry.getKey();                                                                                     
                             400:            Long objectOffset = objectEntry.getValue();                                                                                        
                             401:            // a negative offset number represents an object number itself                                                                     
                             402:            // see type 2 entry in xref stream                                                                                                 
                             403:            if (objectOffset != null && objectOffset >= 0)                                                                                     
                             404:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             405:                COSObjectKey foundObjectKey = findObjectKey(objectKey, objectOffset, xrefOffset);                                              
                             406:                if (foundObjectKey == null)                                                                                                    
                             407:                {                                                                                                                              
                             408:                    LOG.debug(                                                                                                                 
                             409:                            "Stop checking xref offsets as at least one ({}) couldn't be dereferenced",                                        
                             410:                            objectKey);                                                                                                        
                             411:                    return false;                                                                                                              
                             412:                }                                                                                                                              
                             413:                else if (foundObjectKey != objectKey)                                                                                          
                             414:                {                                                                                                                              
                             415:                    // Generation was fixed - need to update map later, after iteration                                                        
                             416:                    correctedKeys.put(objectKey, foundObjectKey);                                                                              
                             417:                }                                                                                                                              
                             418:                else                                                                                                                           
                             419:                {                                                                                                                              
                             420:                    validKeys.add(objectKey);                                                                                                  
                             421:                }                                                                                                                              
                             422:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             423:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             424:        Map<COSObjectKey, Long> correctedPointers = new HashMap<>();                                                                           
                             425:        for (Entry<COSObjectKey, COSObjectKey> correctedKeyEntry : correctedKeys.entrySet())                                                   
                             426:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             427:            if (!validKeys.contains(correctedKeyEntry.getValue()))                                                                             
                             428:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             429:                // Only replace entries, if the original entry does not point to a valid object                                                
                             430:                correctedPointers.put(correctedKeyEntry.getValue(),                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:793-836                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             793:    private long readUntilEndStream(final EndstreamFilterStream out) throws IOException                                                        
                             794:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             795:        int bufSize;                                                                                                                           
                             796:        int charMatchCount = 0;                                                                                                                
                             797:        byte[] keyw = ENDSTREAM;                                                                                                               
                             798:                                                                                                                                               
                             799:        // last character position of shortest keyword ('endobj')                                                                              
                             800:        final int quickTestOffset = 5;                                                                                                         
                             801:                                                                                                                                               
                             802:        // read next chunk into buffer; already matched chars are added to beginning of buffer                                                 
                             803:        while ( ( bufSize = source.read( strmBuf, charMatchCount, STRMBUFLEN - charMatchCount ) ) > 0 )                                        
                             804:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             805:            bufSize += charMatchCount;                                                                                                         
                             806:                                                                                                                                               
                             807:            int bIdx = charMatchCount;                                                                                                         
                             808:            int quickTestIdx;                                                                                                                  
                             809:                                                                                                                                               
                             810:            // iterate over buffer, trying to find keyword match                                                                               
                             811:            for ( int maxQuicktestIdx = bufSize - quickTestOffset; bIdx < bufSize; bIdx++ )                                                    
                             812:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             813:                // reduce compare operations by first test last character we would have to                                                     
                             814:                // match if current one matches; if it is not a character from keywords                                                        
                             815:                // we can move behind the test character; this shortcut is inspired by the                                                     
                             816:                // Boyer-Moore string search algorithm and can reduce parsing time by approx. 20%                                              
                             817:                quickTestIdx = bIdx + quickTestOffset;                                                                                         
                             818:                if (charMatchCount == 0 && quickTestIdx < maxQuicktestIdx)                                                                     
                             819:                {                                                                                                                              
                             820:                    final byte ch = strmBuf[quickTestIdx];                                                                                     
                             821:                    if ( ( ch > 't' ) || ( ch < 'a' ) )                                                                                        
                             822:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             823:                        // last character we would have to match if current character would match                                              
                             824:                        // is not a character from keywords -> jump behind and start over                                                      
                             825:                        bIdx = quickTestIdx;                                                                                                   
                             826:                        continue;                                                                                                              
                             827:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             828:                }                                                                                                                              
                             829:                                                                                                                                               
                             830:                // could be negative - but we only compare to ASCII                                                                            
                             831:                final byte ch = strmBuf[bIdx];                                                                                                 
                             832:                                                                                                                                               
                             833:                if ( ch == keyw[ charMatchCount ] )                                                                                            
                             834:                {                                                                                                                              
                             835:                    if ( ++charMatchCount == keyw.length )                                                                                     
                             836:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:713-777                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             713:    protected COSStream parseCOSStream(COSDictionary dic) throws IOException                                                                   
                             714:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             715:        // read 'stream'; this was already tested in parseObjectsDynamically()                                                                 
                             716:        readString();                                                                                                                          
                             717:                                                                                                                                               
                             718:        skipWhiteSpaces();                                                                                                                     
                             719:                                                                                                                                               
                             720:        /*                                                                                                                                     
                             721:         * This needs to be dic.getItem because when we are parsing, the underlying object might still be null.                                
                             722:         */                                                                                                                                    
                             723:        COSNumber streamLengthObj = getLength(dic.getItem(COSName.LENGTH));                                                                    
                             724:        if (streamLengthObj == null)                                                                                                           
                             725:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             726:            if (isLenient)                                                                                                                     
                             727:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             728:                LOG.warn(                                                                                                                      
                             729:                        "The stream doesn't provide any stream length, using fallback readUntilEnd, at offset {}",                             
                             730:                        source.getPosition());                                                                                                 
                             731:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             732:            else                                                                                                                               
                             733:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             734:                throw new IOException("Missing length for stream.");                                                                           
                             735:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             736:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             737:                                                                                                                                               
                             738:                                                                                                                                               
                             739:        long streamStartPosition = source.getPosition();                                                                                       
                             740:        long streamLength;                                                                                                                     
                             741:        if (streamLengthObj != null && validateStreamLength(streamLengthObj.longValue()))                                                      
                             742:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             743:            streamLength = streamLengthObj.longValue();                                                                                        
                             744:            // skip stream                                                                                                                     
                             745:            source.seek(source.getPosition() + streamLengthObj.intValue());                                                                    
                             746:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             747:        else                                                                                                                                   
                             748:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             749:            streamLength = readUntilEndStream(new EndstreamFilterStream());                                                                    
                             750:            if (streamLengthObj == null || streamLengthObj.longValue() != streamLength)                                                        
                             751:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             752:                dic.setLong(COSName.LENGTH, streamLength);                                                                                     
                             753:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             754:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             755:        String endStream = readString();                                                                                                       
                             756:        if (endStream.equals("endobj") && isLenient)                                                                                           
                             757:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             758:            LOG.warn("stream ends with 'endobj' instead of 'endstream' at offset {}",                                                          
                             759:                    source.getPosition());                                                                                                     
                             760:            // avoid follow-up warning about missing endobj                                                                                    
                             761:            source.rewind(ENDOBJ.length);                                                                                                      
                             762:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             763:        else if (endStream.length() > 9 && isLenient && endStream.startsWith(ENDSTREAM_STRING))                                                
                             764:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             765:            LOG.warn("stream ends with '{}' instead of 'endstream' at offset {}", endStream,                                                   
                             766:                    source.getPosition());                                                                                                     
                             767:            // unread the "extra" bytes                                                                                                        
                             768:            source.rewind(endStream.substring(9).getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1).length);                                                
                             769:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             770:        else if (!endStream.equals(ENDSTREAM_STRING))                                                                                          
                             771:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             772:            throw new IOException(                                                                                                             
                             773:                    "Error reading stream, expected='endstream' actual='"                                                                      
                             774:                            + endStream + "' at offset " + source.getPosition());                                                              
                             775:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             776:        return document.createCOSStream(dic, streamStartPosition, streamLength);                                                               
                             777:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/BaseParser.java:339-375                                                                           
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             339:    private boolean readUntilEndOfCOSDictionary() throws IOException                                                                           
                             340:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             341:        int c = source.read();                                                                                                                 
                             342:        while (c != -1 && c != '/' && c != '>')                                                                                                
                             343:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             344:            // in addition to stopping when we find / or >, we also want                                                                       
                             345:            // to stop when we find endstream or endobj.                                                                                       
                             346:            if (c == E)                                                                                                                        
                             347:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             348:                c = source.read();                                                                                                             
                             349:                if (c == N)                                                                                                                    
                             350:                {                                                                                                                              
                             351:                    c = source.read();                                                                                                         
                             352:                    if (c == D)                                                                                                                
                             353:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             354:                        c = source.read();                                                                                                     
                             355:                        boolean isStream = c == S && source.read() == T && source.read() == R                                                  
                             356:                                && source.read() == E && source.read() == A && source.read() == M;                                             
                             357:                        boolean isObj = !isStream && c == O && source.read() == B                                                              
                             358:                                && source.read() == J;                                                                                         
                             359:                        if (isStream || isObj)                                                                                                 
                             360:                        {                                                                                                                      
                             361:                            // we're done reading this object!                                                                                 
                             362:                            return true;                                                                                                       
                             363:                        }                                                                                                                      
                             364:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             365:                }                                                                                                                              
                             366:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             367:            c = source.read();                                                                                                                 
                             368:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             369:        if (c == -1)                                                                                                                           
                             370:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             371:            return true;                                                                                                                       
                             372:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             373:        source.rewind(1);                                                                                                                      
                             374:        return false;                                                                                                                          
                             375:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/BaseParser.java:947-1001                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             947:     */                                                                                                                                        
                             948:    protected COSBase parseDirObject() throws IOException                                                                                      
                             949:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             950:        skipSpaces();                                                                                                                          
                             951:        char c = (char) source.peek();                                                                                                         
                             952:        switch(c)                                                                                                                              
                             953:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             954:        case '<':                                                                                                                              
                             955:            // pull off first left bracket                                                                                                     
                             956:            source.read();                                                                                                                     
                             957:            // check for second left bracket                                                                                                   
                             958:            c = (char) source.peek();                                                                                                          
                             959:            source.rewind(1);                                                                                                                  
                             960:            return c == '<' ? parseCOSDictionary(true) : parseCOSString();                                                                     
                             961:        case '[':                                                                                                                              
                             962:            // array                                                                                                                           
                             963:            return parseCOSArray();                                                                                                            
                             964:        case '(':                                                                                                                              
                             965:            return parseCOSString();                                                                                                           
                             966:        case '/':                                                                                                                              
                             967:            // name                                                                                                                            
                             968:            return parseCOSName();                                                                                                             
                             969:        case 'n':                                                                                                                              
                             970:            // null                                                                                                                            
                             971:            readExpectedString(NULL, false);                                                                                                   
                             972:            return COSNull.NULL;                                                                                                               
                             973:        case 't':                                                                                                                              
                             974:            readExpectedString(TRUE, false);                                                                                                   
                             975:            return COSBoolean.TRUE;                                                                                                            
                             976:        case 'f':                                                                                                                              
                             977:            readExpectedString(FALSE, false);                                                                                                  
                             978:            return COSBoolean.FALSE;                                                                                                           
                             979:        case 'R':                                                                                                                              
                             980:            source.read();                                                                                                                     
                             981:            return new COSObject(null);                                                                                                        
                             982:        case (char)-1:                                                                                                                         
                             983:            return null;                                                                                                                       
                             984:        default:                                                                                                                               
                             985:            if (isDigit(c) || c == '-' || c == '+' || c == '.')                                                                                
                             986:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             987:                return parseCOSNumber();                                                                                                       
                             988:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             989:            // This is not suppose to happen, but we will allow for it                                                                         
                             990:            // so we are more compatible with POS writers that don't                                                                           
                             991:            // follow the spec                                                                                                                 
                             992:            long startOffset = source.getPosition();                                                                                           
                             993:            String badString = readString();                                                                                                   
                             994:            if (badString.isEmpty())                                                                                                           
                             995:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             996:                int peek = source.peek();                                                                                                      
                             997:                // we can end up in an infinite loop otherwise                                                                                 
                             998:                throw new IOException("Unknown dir object c='" + c + "' cInt=" + (int) c + " peek='"                                           
                             999:                        + (char) peek + "' peekInt=" + peek + " at offset " + source.getPosition()                                             
                             1000:                        + " (start offset: " + startOffset + ")");                                                                            
                             1001:            }                                                                                                                                 
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>
