                             MB were scanned.                                                                                                                                   
                                - In the `findString(char[] string)` method, recorded `startPos = source.getPosition()` and returned `-1` if the scan exceeded                  
                             10 MB.                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             Result After Patch                                                                                                                                 
                             - The harness was recompiled with the above changes.                                                                                               
                             - A subsequent fuzzing session still ended with:                                                                                                   
                               ```                                                                                                                                              
                               ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                                                                        
                               ```                                                                                                                                              
                             - No additional log messages (e.g., No endstream found or brute-force-scan debug messages) were observed, suggesting the fuzzer                 
                             did not hit those early-abort branches but rather timed out elsewhere.                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             Areas for Further Investigation                                                                                                                    
                             - Other parsing loops or search routines in COSParser and associated filter streams that may run unbounded.                                        
                             - Xref stream parsing logic outside of `validateXrefOffsets`, including indirect object resolution and cross-reference stream                      
                             decoding.                                                                                                                                          
                             - Any large-data filter processing (e.g., Flate, LZW) that might consume significant time before handing off to the parser loops.                  
                             - The integration between the fuzzing harness and the PDFBox loading entry points to identify which code paths are predominantly                   
                             exercised during the timeout.                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Initial Issue Log                                                                                                                               
                             Here is the initial issue log of the codebase:                                                                                                     
                             <issue>                                                                                                                                            
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             </issue>                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Additional Issue Log                                                                                                                            
                             Here is the additional issue log after the last patch attempt:                                                                                     
                             <additional_issue>                                                                                                                                 
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             </additional_issue>                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Notes                                                                                                                                           
                             - All patch attempts are applied to the initial codebase. Reapply the the previous patches if needed.                                              
                             - If multiple different issues are present, all the issues must be resolved in a single patch attempt.                                             
                             - Try different approaches to resolve the issues.                                                                                                  
                             ===Analysis Report===                                                                                                                              
                             # Analysis Report                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Relevant Code Snippets                                                                                                                          
                             <code_snippets>                                                                                                                                    
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:713-777                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             713:    protected COSStream parseCOSStream(COSDictionary dic) throws IOException                                                                   
                             714:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             715:        // read 'stream'; this was already tested in parseObjectsDynamically()                                                                 
                             716:        readString();                                                                                                                          
                             717:                                                                                                                                               
                             718:        skipWhiteSpaces();                                                                                                                     
                             719:                                                                                                                                               
                             720:        /*                                                                                                                                     
                             721:         * This needs to be dic.getItem because when we are parsing, the underlying object might still be null.                                
                             722:         */                                                                                                                                    
                             723:        COSNumber streamLengthObj = getLength(dic.getItem(COSName.LENGTH));                                                                    
                             724:        if (streamLengthObj == null)                                                                                                           
                             725:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             726:            if (isLenient)                                                                                                                     
                             727:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             728:                LOG.warn(                                                                                                                      
                             729:                        "The stream doesn't provide any stream length, using fallback readUntilEnd, at offset {}",                             
                             730:                        source.getPosition());                                                                                                 
                             731:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             732:            else                                                                                                                               
                             733:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             734:                throw new IOException("Missing length for stream.");                                                                           
                             735:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             736:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             737:                                                                                                                                               
                             738:                                                                                                                                               
                             739:        long streamStartPosition = source.getPosition();                                                                                       
                             740:        long streamLength;                                                                                                                     
                             741:        if (streamLengthObj != null && validateStreamLength(streamLengthObj.longValue()))                                                      
                             742:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             743:            streamLength = streamLengthObj.longValue();                                                                                        
                             744:            // skip stream                                                                                                                     
                             745:            source.seek(source.getPosition() + streamLengthObj.intValue());                                                                    
                             746:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             747:        else                                                                                                                                   
                             748:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             749:            streamLength = readUntilEndStream(new EndstreamFilterStream());                                                                    
                             750:            if (streamLengthObj == null || streamLengthObj.longValue() != streamLength)                                                        
                             751:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             752:                dic.setLong(COSName.LENGTH, streamLength);                                                                                     
                             753:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             754:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             755:        String endStream = readString();                                                                                                       
                             756:        if (endStream.equals("endobj") && isLenient)                                                                                           
                             757:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             758:            LOG.warn("stream ends with 'endobj' instead of 'endstream' at offset {}",                                                          
                             759:                    source.getPosition());                                                                                                     
                             760:            // avoid follow-up warning about missing endobj                                                                                    
                             761:            source.rewind(ENDOBJ.length);                                                                                                      
                             762:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             763:        else if (endStream.length() > 9 && isLenient && endStream.startsWith(ENDSTREAM_STRING))                                                
                             764:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             765:            LOG.warn("stream ends with '{}' instead of 'endstream' at offset {}", endStream,                                                   
                             766:                    source.getPosition());                                                                                                     
                             767:            // unread the "extra" bytes                                                                                                        
                             768:            source.rewind(endStream.substring(9).getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1).length);                                                
                             769:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             770:        else if (!endStream.equals(ENDSTREAM_STRING))                                                                                          
                             771:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             772:            throw new IOException(                                                                                                             
                             773:                    "Error reading stream, expected='endstream' actual='"                                                                      
                             774:                            + endStream + "' at offset " + source.getPosition());                                                              
                             775:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             776:        return document.createCOSStream(dic, streamStartPosition, streamLength);                                                               
                             777:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:793-885                                                                            
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             793:    private long readUntilEndStream(final EndstreamFilterStream out) throws IOException                                                        
                             794:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             795:        int bufSize;                                                                                                                           
                             796:        int charMatchCount = 0;                                                                                                                
                             797:        byte[] keyw = ENDSTREAM;                                                                                                               
                             798:                                                                                                                                               
                             799:        // last character position of shortest keyword ('endobj')                                                                              
                             800:        final int quickTestOffset = 5;                                                                                                         
                             801:                                                                                                                                               
                             802:        // read next chunk into buffer; already matched chars are added to beginning of buffer                                                 
                             803:        while ( ( bufSize = source.read( strmBuf, charMatchCount, STRMBUFLEN - charMatchCount ) ) > 0 )                                        
                             804:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             805:            bufSize += charMatchCount;                                                                                                         
                             806:                                                                                                                                               
                             807:            int bIdx = charMatchCount;                                                                                                         
                             808:            int quickTestIdx;                                                                                                                  
                             809:                                                                                                                                               
                             810:            // iterate over buffer, trying to find keyword match                                                                               
                             811:            for ( int maxQuicktestIdx = bufSize - quickTestOffset; bIdx < bufSize; bIdx++ )                                                    
                             812:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             813:                // reduce compare operations by first test last character we would have to                                                     
                             814:                // match if current one matches; if it is not a character from keywords                                                        
                             815:                // we can move behind the test character; this shortcut is inspired by the                                                     
                             816:                // Boyer-Moore string search algorithm and can reduce parsing time by approx. 20%                                              
                             817:                quickTestIdx = bIdx + quickTestOffset;                                                                                         
                             818:                if (charMatchCount == 0 && quickTestIdx < maxQuicktestIdx)                                                                     
                             819:                {                                                                                                                              
                             820:                    final byte ch = strmBuf[quickTestIdx];                                                                                     
                             821:                    if ( ( ch > 't' ) || ( ch < 'a' ) )                                                                                        
                             822:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             823:                        // last character we would have to match if current character would match                                              
                             824:                        // is not a character from keywords -> jump behind and start over                                                      
                             825:                        bIdx = quickTestIdx;                                                                                                   
                             826:                        continue;                                                                                                              
                             827:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             828:                }                                                                                                                              
                             829:                                                                                                                                               
                             830:                // could be negative - but we only compare to ASCII                                                                            
                             831:                final byte ch = strmBuf[bIdx];                                                                                                 
                             832:                                                                                                                                               
                             833:                if ( ch == keyw[ charMatchCount ] )                                                                                            
                             834:                {                                                                                                                              
                             835:                    if ( ++charMatchCount == keyw.length )                                                                                     
                             836:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             837:                        // match found                                                                                                         
                             838:                        bIdx++;                                                                                                                
                             839:                        break;                                                                                                                 
                             840:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             841:                }                                                                                                                              
                             842:                else                                                                                                                           
                             843:                {                                                                                                                              
                             844:                    if ( ( charMatchCount == 3 ) && ( ch == ENDOBJ[ charMatchCount ] ) )                                                       
                             845:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             846:                        // maybe ENDSTREAM is missing but we could have ENDOBJ                                                                 
                             847:                        keyw = ENDOBJ;                                                                                                         
                             848:                        charMatchCount++;                                                                                                      
                             849:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             850:                    else                                                                                                                       
                             851:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             852:                        // no match; incrementing match start by 1 would be dumb since we already know                                         
                             853:                        // matched chars depending on current char read we may already have beginning                                          
                             854:                        // of a new match: 'e': first char matched; 'n': if we are at match position                                           
                             855:                        // idx 7 we already read 'e' thus 2 chars matched for each other char we have                                          
                             856:                        // to start matching first keyword char beginning with next read position                                              
                             857:                        charMatchCount = ( ch == E ) ? 1 : ( ( ch == N ) && ( charMatchCount == 7 ) ) ? 2 : 0;                                 
                             858:                        // search again for 'endstream'                                                                                        
                             859:                        keyw = ENDSTREAM;                                                                                                      
                             860:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             861:                }                                                                                                                              
                             862:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             863:                                                                                                                                               
                             864:            int contentBytes = Math.max( 0, bIdx - charMatchCount );                                                                           
                             865:                                                                                                                                               
                             866:            // write buffer content until first matched char to output stream                                                                  
                             867:            if ( contentBytes > 0 )                                                                                                            
                             868:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             869:                out.filter(strmBuf, 0, contentBytes);                                                                                          
                             870:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             871:            if ( charMatchCount == keyw.length )                                                                                               
                             872:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             873:                // keyword matched; unread matched keyword (endstream/endobj) and following buffered content                                   
                             874:                source.rewind( bufSize - contentBytes );                                                                                       
                             875:                break;                                                                                                                         
                             876:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             877:            else                                                                                                                               
                             878:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             879:                // copy matched chars at start of buffer                                                                                       
                             880:                System.arraycopy( keyw, 0, strmBuf, 0, charMatchCount );                                                                       
                             881:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             882:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             883:        // this writes a lonely CR or drops trailing CR LF and LF                                                                              
                             884:        return out.calculateLength();                                                                                                          
                             885:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/PDFStreamParser.java:78-87                                                                        
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             78:    public List<Object> parse() throws IOException                                                                                              
                             79:    {                                                                                                                                           
                             80:        List<Object> streamObjects = new ArrayList<>(100);                                                                                      
                             81:        Object token;                                                                                                                           
                             82:        while( (token = parseNextToken()) != null )                                                                                             
                             83:        {                                                                                                                                       
                             84:            streamObjects.add( token );                                                                                                         
                             85:        }                                                                                                                                       
                             86:        return streamObjects;                                                                                                                   
                             87:    }                                                                                                                                           
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/PDFStreamParser.java:96-112                                                                       
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             96:    public Object parseNextToken() throws IOException                                                                                           
                             97:    {                                                                                                                                           
                             98:        if (source.isClosed())                                                                                                                  
                             99:        {                                                                                                                                       
                             100:            return null;                                                                                                                       
                             101:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             102:        skipSpaces();                                                                                                                          
                             103:        if (source.isEOF())                                                                                                                    
                             104:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             105:            close();                                                                                                                           
                             106:            return null;                                                                                                                       
                             107:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             108:        char c = (char) source.peek();                                                                                                         
                             109:        switch (c)                                                                                                                             
                             110:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             111:            case '<':                                                                                                                          
                             112:                // pull off first left bracket                                                                                                 
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/PDFXrefStreamParser.java:119-130                                                                  
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             119:    public void parse(XrefTrailerResolver resolver) throws IOException                                                                         
                             120:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             121:        byte[] currLine = new byte[w[0] + w[1] + w[2]];                                                                                        
                             122:        while (!source.isEOF() && objectNumbers.hasNext())                                                                                     
                             123:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             124:            readNextValue(currLine);                                                                                                           
                             125:            // get the current objID                                                                                                           
                             126:            long objID = objectNumbers.next();                                                                                                 
                             127:            // default value is 1 if w[0] == 0, otherwise parse first field                                                                    
                             128:            int type = w[0] == 0 ? 1 : (int) parseValue(currLine, 0, w[0]);                                                                    
                             129:            // Skip free objects (type 0) and invalid types                                                                                    
                             130:            if (type == 0)                                                                                                                     
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/PDFXrefStreamParser.java:131-152                                                                  
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             131:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             132:                continue;                                                                                                                      
                             133:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             134:            // second field holds the offset (type 1) or the object stream number (type 2)                                                     
                             135:            long offset = parseValue(currLine, w[0], w[1]);                                                                                    
                             136:            // third filed may hold the generation number (type1) or the index within a object stream (type2)                                  
                             137:            int thirdValue = (int) parseValue(currLine, w[0] + w[1], w[2]);                                                                    
                             138:            if (type == 1)                                                                                                                     
                             139:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             140:                // third field holds the generation number for type 1 entries                                                                  
                             141:                resolver.setXRef(new COSObjectKey(objID, thirdValue), offset);                                                                 
                             142:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             143:            else                                                                                                                               
                             144:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             145:                // For XRef aware parsers we have to know which objects contain object streams. We will store this                             
                             146:                // information in normal xref mapping table but add object stream number with minus sign in order to                           
                             147:                // distinguish from file offsets                                                                                               
                             148:                resolver.setXRef(new COSObjectKey(objID, 0, thirdValue), -offset);                                                             
                             149:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             150:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             151:        close();                                                                                                                               
                             152:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/XrefParser.java:472-546                                                                           
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             472:    private COSObjectKey findObjectKey(COSObjectKey objectKey, long offset,                                                                    
                             473:            Map<COSObjectKey, Long> xrefOffset) throws IOException                                                                             
                             474:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             475:        // there can't be any object at the very beginning of a pdf                                                                            
                             476:        if (offset < COSParser.MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET)                                                                                          
                             477:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             478:            return null;                                                                                                                       
                             479:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             480:        try                                                                                                                                    
                             481:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             482:            source.seek(offset);                                                                                                               
                             483:            parser.skipWhiteSpaces();                                                                                                          
                             484:            if (source.getPosition() == offset)                                                                                                
                             485:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             486:                // ensure that at least one whitespace is skipped in front of the object number                                                
                             487:                source.seek(offset - 1);                                                                                                       
                             488:                if (source.getPosition() < offset)                                                                                             
                             489:                {                                                                                                                              
                             490:                    if (!parser.isDigit())                                                                                                     
                             491:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             492:                        // anything else but a digit may be some garbage of the previous object -> just ignore it                              
                             493:                        source.read();                                                                                                         
                             494:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             495:                    else                                                                                                                       
                             496:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             497:                        long current = source.getPosition();                                                                                   
                             498:                        source.seek(--current);                                                                                                
                             499:                        while (parser.isDigit())                                                                                               
                             500:                            source.seek(--current);                                                                                            
                             501:                        long newObjNr = parser.readObjectNumber();                                                                             
                             502:                        int newGenNr = parser.readGenerationNumber();                                                                          
                             503:                        COSObjectKey newObjKey = new COSObjectKey(newObjNr, newGenNr);                                                         
                             504:                        Long existingOffset = xrefOffset.get(newObjKey);                                                                       
                             505:                        // the found object number belongs to another uncompressed object at the same or nearby offset                         
                             506:                        // something has to be wrong                                                                                           
                             507:                        if (existingOffset != null && existingOffset > 0                                                                       
                             508:                                && Math.abs(offset - existingOffset) < 10)                                                                     
                             509:                        {                                                                                                                      
                             510:                            LOG.debug("Found the object {} instead of {} at offset {} - ignoring",                                             
                             511:                                    newObjKey, objectKey, offset);                                                                             
                             512:                            return null;                                                                                                       
                             513:                        }                                                                                                                      
                             514:                        // something seems to be wrong but it's hard to determine what exactly -> simply continue                              
                             515:                        source.seek(offset);                                                                                                   
                             516:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             517:                }                                                                                                                              
                             518:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             519:            // try to read the given object/generation number                                                                                  
                             520:            long foundObjectNumber = parser.readObjectNumber();                                                                                
                             521:            if (objectKey.getNumber() != foundObjectNumber)                                                                                    
                             522:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             523:                LOG.warn("found wrong object number. expected [{}] found [{}]",                                                                
                             524:                        objectKey.getNumber(), foundObjectNumber);                                                                             
                             525:                objectKey = new COSObjectKey(foundObjectNumber, objectKey.getGeneration());                                                    
                             526:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             527:                                                                                                                                               
                             528:            int genNumber = parser.readGenerationNumber();                                                                                     
                             529:            // finally try to read the object marker                                                                                           
                             530:            parser.readObjectMarker();                                                                                                         
                             531:            if (genNumber == objectKey.getGeneration())                                                                                        
                             532:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             533:                return objectKey;                                                                                                              
                             534:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             535:            else if (genNumber > objectKey.getGeneration())                                                                                    
                             536:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             537:                return new COSObjectKey(objectKey.getNumber(), genNumber);                                                                     
                             538:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             539:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             540:        catch (IOException exception)                                                                                                          
                             541:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             542:            // Swallow the exception, obviously there isn't any valid object number                                                            
                             543:            LOG.debug("No valid object at given location {} - ignoring", offset, exception);                                                   
                             544:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             545:        return null;                                                                                                                           
                             546:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             <code>                                                                                                                                             
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/BaseParser.java:755-822                                                                           
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             755:    protected COSArray parseCOSArray() throws IOException                                                                                      
                             756:    {                                                                                                                                          
                             757:        long startPosition = source.getPosition();                                                                                             
                             758:        readExpectedChar('[');                                                                                                                 
                             759:        COSArray po = new COSArray();                                                                                                          
                             760:        COSBase pbo;                                                                                                                           
                             761:        skipSpaces();                                                                                                                          
                             762:        int i;                                                                                                                                 
                             763:        while (((i = source.peek()) > 0) && ((char) i != ']'))                                                                                 
                             764:        {                                                                                                                                      
                             765:            pbo = parseDirObject();                                                                                                            
                             766:            if( pbo instanceof COSObject )                                                                                                     
                             767:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             768:                // the current empty COSObject is replaced with the correct one                                                                
                             769:                pbo = null;                                                                                                                    
                             770:                // We have to check if the expected values are there or not PDFBOX-385                                                         
                             771:                if (po.size() > 1 && po.get(po.size() - 1) instanceof COSInteger)                                                              
                             772:                {                                                                                                                              
                             773:                    COSInteger genNumber = (COSInteger)po.remove( po.size() -1 );                                                              
                             774:                    if (po.size() > 0 && po.get(po.size() - 1) instanceof COSInteger)                                                          
                             775:                    {                                                                                                                          
                             776:                        COSInteger number = (COSInteger)po.remove( po.size() -1 );                                                             
                             777:                        if (number.longValue() >= 0 && genNumber.intValue() >= 0)                                                              
                             778:                        {                                                                                                                      
                             779:                            COSObjectKey key = getObjectKey(number.longValue(),                                                                
                             780:                                    genNumber.intValue());                                                                                     
                             781:                            pbo = getObjectFromPool(key);                                                                                      
                             782:                        }                                                                                                                      
                             783:                        else                                                                                                                   
                             784:                        {                                                                                                                      
                             785:                            LOG.warn("Invalid value(s) for an object key {} {}", number.longValue(),                                           
                             786:                                    genNumber.intValue());                                                                                     
                             787:                        }                                                                                                                      
                             788:                    }                                                                                                                          
                             789:                }                                                                                                                              
                             790:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             791:            // something went wrong                                                                                                            
                             792:            if (pbo == null)                                                                                                                   
                             793:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             794:                //it could be a bad object in the array which is just skipped                                                                  
                             795:                LOG.warn("Corrupt array element at offset {}, start offset: {}",                                                               
                             796:                        source.getPosition(), startPosition);                                                                                  
                             797:                String isThisTheEnd = readString();                                                                                            
                             798:                // return immediately if a corrupt element is followed by another array                                                        
                             799:                // to avoid a possible infinite recursion as most likely the whole array is corrupted                                          
                             800:                if (isThisTheEnd.isEmpty() && source.peek() == '[')                                                                            
                             801:                {                                                                                                                              
                             802:                    return po;                                                                                                                 
                             803:                }                                                                                                                              
                             804:                source.rewind(isThisTheEnd.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1).length);                                                      
                             805:                // This could also be an "endobj" or "endstream" which means we can assume that                                                
                             806:                // the array has ended.                                                                                                        
                             807:                if(ENDOBJ_STRING.equals(isThisTheEnd) || ENDSTREAM_STRING.equals(isThisTheEnd))                                                
                             808:                {                                                                                                                              
                             809:                    return po;                                                                                                                 
                             810:                }                                                                                                                              
                             811:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             812:            else                                                                                                                               
                             813:            {                                                                                                                                  
                             814:                po.add(pbo);                                                                                                                   
                             815:            }                                                                                                                                  
                             816:            skipSpaces();                                                                                                                      
                             817:        }                                                                                                                                      
                             818:        // read ']'                                                                                                                            
                             819:        source.read();                                                                                                                         
                             820:        skipSpaces();                                                                                                                          
                             821:        return po;                                                                                                                             
                             822:    }                                                                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                                                                
                             </code>                                                                                                                                            
                             </code_snippets>                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                
                             ## Fix Strategy                                                                                                                                    
                             <fix_strategy>
